text: Josepɨ 42.6 HM 37.8-10, 41.41-43, 41.55, 50.18 nɨbu manɨgali hɨnihɨni Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ migɨlɨdaci hulaŋ iamɨgali fɨli tɨbɨ mu hɨsɨŋ mu hɨsɨŋ agɨlaŋ nudɨ pɨŋ veve halɨha cahu uitɨ lavavɨmi. Lɨhavɨdaci Josepɨ isagalinu agɨlaŋ vevɨla nudɨ pɨŋ iahavɨla nudɨ ibi mɨŋaiahɨbalu aba fɨli hɨvɨ sɨkasɨkan mɨgavɨla ipalavɨci mɨguavɨci ani valɨ hɨniavɨmi.
